name: A Platform Fight
description:
This is my personal project, currently named "A Platform Fight." It started out in May of 2015, and I've been working on it off and on since then. There's no set release date since this is simply a hobby of mine, but anyone is welcome to check it out and provide feedback.

For the most part, this site is meant as a way to get to the download and for me to log what I've been doing. Feel free to check out the devlog for updates.

Here's the latest information on how to play.

Major steps to completion:

  • Fully implement 25 techniques.
  • Improve GUI.
  • Bug Fixes.
  • Publish!
